field_provus_body.value: The Meridian Aquatics Center serves county residents by providing a wide range of swimming and water-based activities for people of all ages and skill levels. With both indoor and outdoor facilities, it offers opportunities for swimming lessons, fitness classes, competitive swim meets, and recreational swim time. Additionally, the facilities are open to hosting community events via various rental options for private events and functions.
